MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH12 postcode area of Edinburgh affecting properties in Craigs Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:03am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midday. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:03am on the 26th of March 2021.
